result.content:
• Expand
  • Collapse

Included page: .ScenarioLibrary (edit)

These scenarios will be accessible to all test cases in the the FitNesseRoot folder. If you are using a different FitNesseRoot Folder, make sure to copy these files if using any setup scenarios.


Update these variables for your specific test environment


  • Expand
  • Collapse

Variables for Scenarios

Default browser can be FIREFOX, CHROME, or IE
variable defined: defaultBrowser=FIREFOX

Default Version cane be 16.2, 16.1, 7.11, or 7.11
variable defined: defaultVersion=16.1

Default Locale can be en_US or en_GB
variable defined: defaultLocale=en_US

Default URL should include http or https and /suite (e.g. https://forum.appian.com/suite )

variable defined: defaultURL=REPLACE_APPIAN_URL

To use out of the box functionality, do not update the scenarios below


  • Expand
  • Collapse

Setup customizable for browser, locale, version, and URL

scenario setup for test script for browser browserType locale location version versionNum url appianUrl
setup with browser @browserType
set appian locale to @location
set appian version to @versionNum
set appian url to @appianUrl
set timeout seconds to 20
set start datetime

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Scenario - Setup using default values

scenario setup for test script
setup for test script for browser FIREFOX locale en_US version 16.1 url REPLACE_APPIAN_URL

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Scenario - Login User into Appian

scenario login user with text txtUserId
setup with browser CHROME
login with username @txtUserId

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Initialization

This table initializes the fixture class and sets the environment defaults
script com.appiancorp.ps.automatedtest.fixture.TempoFixture
set appian url to http://cnu414bxbz.appiancorp.com:8080/suite
set appian version to 16.2
set appian locale to en_US
  • Expand
  • Collapse

Set Suite Variables

This table creates a variable which will be available in all tests by using tv!titleThis table creates a variable which will be available in all tests by using tv!title
script
$var<-[vRDf9] get random string 5
set test variable title with $var->[vRDf9]

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Included page: .ScenarioLibrary (edit)

These scenarios will be accessible to all test cases in the the FitNesseRoot folder. If you are using a different FitNesseRoot Folder, make sure to copy these files if using any setup scenarios.


Update these variables for your specific test environment


  • Expand
  • Collapse

Variables for Scenarios

Default browser can be FIREFOX, CHROME, or IE
variable defined: defaultBrowser=FIREFOX

Default Version cane be 16.2, 16.1, 7.11, or 7.11
variable defined: defaultVersion=16.1

Default Locale can be en_US or en_GB
variable defined: defaultLocale=en_US

Default URL should include http or https and /suite (e.g. https://forum.appian.com/suite )

variable defined: defaultURL=REPLACE_APPIAN_URL

To use out of the box functionality, do not update the scenarios below


  • Expand
  • Collapse

Setup customizable for browser, locale, version, and URL

scenario setup for test script for browser browserType locale location version versionNum url appianUrl
setup with browser @browserType
set appian locale to @location
set appian version to @versionNum
set appian url to @appianUrl
set timeout seconds to 20
set start datetime

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Scenario - Setup using default values

scenario setup for test script
setup for test script for browser FIREFOX locale en_US version 16.1 url REPLACE_APPIAN_URL

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Scenario - Login User into Appian

scenario login user with text txtUserId
setup with browser CHROME
login with username @txtUserId

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Initialization

This table opens a new instance of the browser, navigates to Appian, and logs in the user.
script
login user with text tarun.abraham
scenario login user with text txtUserId
setup with browser CHROME
login with username tarun.abraham

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Open Record and Add Escalation Comment

script
click on menu Records
click on record type Engineering Stock
click on record 716-254628-011
populate field [1] in section Comment & Escalation Info with Es
click on button Comment
show Invalid argument: Get field value - [27] get field [27] value
verify field Timeout period reached: Get field value - [27] [27] contains validation message Comment length should be greater than 6 characters and less than 800 characters.




  • Expand
  • Collapse

Log out and tear down

This table logs out of Appian and closes the browser.
script
logout
tear down

instructionResult.instruction: {id='scriptTable_4_3', instruction='call', instanceName='scriptTableActor', methodName='populateFieldInSectionWith', args=[[1], Comment & Escalation Info, Es]}

{id='scriptTable_4_6', instruction='call', instanceName='scriptTableActor', methodName='verifyFieldContainsValidationMessage', args=[[27], Comment length should be greater than 6 characters and less than 800 characters.]}
